pages.text: aur tum Allah taâ€™ala ke saamne sarkashi na karo, main tumhaare paas kholi daleel laane waala hoon
aur main apne aur tumhaare rab ki panaah mein aata hoon, us se ke tum mujhe sangsaar kardo
aur agar tum mujh par imaan nahi laate to mujh se alag hee raho
phir unhone apne rab se dua ki, ke ye sab gunehgaar log hai
(hum ne keh diya) ke raatho raath tu mere bandho ko le kar nikal, yaqinan tumhara picha kiya jayega
to tu darya ko saakin1 chohd kar chala ja, bila shuba ye lashkar gharq kar diya jayega
wo bahuth se baghaath aur chashme chohd gaye
aur khetiyaa aur raahath baqsh thikaane
aur wo araam ki chize jin mein aysh kar rahe thein
osi tarah ho gaya aur hum ne un sab ka waaris dosri khaum ko bana diya
so un par na to asmaan wa zameen roye aur na unhe mahullat mili
aur beshak hum ne (hee) bani israel ko (saqth) ruswa kun saza se najaath di
(jo) feraun ki taraf se (ho rahi) thi, fil waaqe wo sarkash aur hadh se guzar jaane waalo mein se tha
aur hum ne daanista taur par bani israel ko dunya jahaan waalo par fauqiyath di
aur hum ne unhe aisi nishaaniya di jin mein sarih azmaayesh thi
ye log to yahi kehte hai
ke (aaqri cheez) yahi hamaara pehli baar (dunya se) mar jaana hai aur hum dobaara uthaaye nahi jayenge
agar tum sacche ho to hamaare baap dadaao ko le aao
kya ye log behtar hai ya tubbah ki khaum aur jo in se bhi pehle thein, hum ne un sab ko halaak kar diya, yaqinan wo gunehgaar thein
hum ne zameen aur asmaano aur un ke darmiyaan ki cheezo ko khel ke taur par payda nahi kiya
balke hum ne unhe durusth tadhbeer ke saath hee payda kiya hai, lekin un mein se aksar log nahi jaante
